attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like there to be an end to putting tv's and DVD players in prison cells, if somebody has done wrong they are there to be punished not to watch Tv all day, many innocent, who have never done anything wrong, people cannot afford TV's for such reasons and job cutbackes and the credit crunch, i  find it very frustrating that prisoners are treated with such things

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
